message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's worth $150 to me, but I understand its value might be different to you. Considering its quality and features, I propose we start at $130. Let me know if this works for you or if you'd like to make a counteroffer.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $120 for the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in our product. To move forward, I would like to suggest a price of $135 for the product. This reflects its value while allowing us to reach an agreement. Please let me know if this proposal suits you better.
I appreciate your response, Alice. I would like to keep moving towards a mutually beneficial agreement. My counteroffer remains at $120 for the product.

I understand your position, Bob. In order to reach a satisfactory conclusion, I propose a price of $130 for the product. This is slightly above your last offer, reflecting the value of the product to me. I hope this proposal aligns more closely with your expectations. Please let me know what you think.
